name: Under Water In The Sewer
description:
You are swimming in some dirty water and are holding your breath.  You'd
better continue onwards before you drown.  It is a good thing that you can
hold your light above the water-level.

exits.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.
It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs a little bit upwards.
